name: Rockin' Racket
description: Rockin’ Racket is a narrative driven, fast paced, band-management game with an undercurrent of teenage angst. As their big brother, you manage a rockin’ quartet of teen raccoons who desperately want to break out into the limelight. With no money and only the instruments in their hands, it’s up to you to keep this pop punk band afloat. Fix your band’s instruments and keep the crowd’s energy up through fast paced mid-concert minigames. After the event, check in with your siblings, buy better equipment from your neighborhood music store, and plan your next venue. Your siblings provide the talent, but it’s up to you to take them to the top.
